About Us

Project Overview

Welcome to the Meeting Minutes Generator! Our project is designed to automate the process of generating meeting minutes from transcripts, making it easier to keep track of important discussions and decisions. The tool provides features such as text preprocessing, summarization, topic extraction, and sentiment analysis to enhance your meeting documentation.
